price: 44. Ezali na bikuke sambo тропа kokota, mpe bikuke binso biyebani na bato ba yango.
arabic: لَهَا سَبۡعَةُ أَبۡوَٰبٖ لِّكُلِّ بَابٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ جُزۡءٞ مَّقۡسُومٌ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: lahā sabʿatu abwābin likulli bābin min'hum juz'on maqsūmun
